NG0400:1: bdud rtsi nges pa'i lung med na //
NG0400:2: 'phags pa'i gdung brgyud gcod par nges //
NG0400:4: zur gsum shel gyi dkyil 'khor la //
NG0400:5: mkhas ba rdo rje thig 'debs pa //
NG0400:6: 'di ni lung gi phug ces bya //
NG0400:7: yum bzhi phyag rgyas btab nas kyang *//
NG0400:8: rdo rje lcags chen mche ba dgu //
NG0400:9: ge sar 'ub chub brlabs kyis brlob //
NG0400:10: rang byung dpa' po'i thugs ka nas //
NG0400:11: gsang ba'i ye shes mngon shar bas //
NG0400:12: 'di ni bsgrub bya gtsor yin te //
NG0400:13: bdud rtsi zhes kyang 'di la bya //
NG0400:14: dur khrod khu byug klong dkyil nas //
NG0400:15: me mar gyis ni lung mnos nas //
NG0400:16: lcags kyi sgrib bur gter bcas shing *//
NG0400:17: chu srin gdug pa'i kha rgyud de //
NG0400:18: spu gri so ni btab pa la //
NG0400:19: bsod nams mthar phyin rnal 'byor dang *//
NG0400:21: dbyings kyi bde la rab gnas shing *//
NG0400:22: yid bzhin nor bu rin chen ltar //
NG0400:24: ji skad smras pa 'gro ba'i don //
NG0400:25: nges don 'dab gshog rgyas pa la //
NG0400:26: dkri don dpyad thag ci la gces //
NG0400:27: grub pa'i nam 'phangs chod pa la //
NG0400:28: gdong bsgrub 'dab gshog skyod mi dgos //
NG0400:29: byang chub sems ni gtan byang la //
NG0400:30: sbyangs ba'i gnyen pos sbyang mi dgos //
NG0400:31: ye nas rnam par dag pa la /
NG0400:32: khrims kyi sdoms pas ci zhig bsrung *//
NG0400:33: 'bras bu ltos pa med pa byang chub sems 'di ni /
NG0400:34: dbyings dang ye shes gnyis su med pa'i byin gyis brlabs las byung ba yang ma yin /
NG0400:35: thabs dang shes rab las rten te 'byung ba yang ma yin /
NG0400:36: rgyu 'byung ba lnga las skyed pa yang ma yin //
NG0400:37: rten cing 'bras bu sku gsung thugs la yang rten mi 'cha' 'o //
NG0400:38: gnas ni yang dag pa'i ye shes bya ba tsam la yang mi gnas so //
NG0400:39: pad+ma ge sar gyi gzhal yas khang pad+ma ge sar gyi klong *//
NG0400:40: byang chub sems kyi dkyil nas ma nor ba'i rak+ta shar ba'i dus na //
NG0400:41: chos thams cad byang chub sems su dbye ba med par lhun gyis grub pa'o //
NG0400:42: yid ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor gyur pa ni //
NG0400:43: byang chub kyi sems yul tsam du snang ngo *//
NG0400:44: rnam pa gcig tu 'bras bu gang la yang ltos
NG0400:45: pa med pa'i byang chub kyi sems ngo bo nyid
NG0400:47: chos kyi dbyings las 'byung ba yang min //
NG0400:48: sangs rgyas kyi che ba'i yon tan gyis byin gyis brlabs las 'byung ba yang min /
NG0400:49: thabs dang shes rab las 'byung ba yang ma yin /
NG0400:50: rgyu rkyen lnga las bskyed de 'byung ba yang ma yin /
NG0400:51: de dag kun gyi bcud kyi snying por byang chub kyi sems shar te /
NG0400:52: sems la mthong zhing rtag tu med pa na /
NG0400:53: phyogs su bltas shing ming med ji ltar yang gdags /
NG0400:54: rtsa ba'i snying po la rtag tu goms par blta'o //
NG0400:55: byang chub kyi sems thig pa nya mo bag la nyal rdzogs 'thun pa'i sgo nas bstan //
NG0400:58: / rgya gar gyi mkhan po shri sid+ha dang */
